MetaData.MetaDataItem: To Exclude your switch, put your HUB in exclusion mode and press the Sensor Button on the back of the device one (1) time.
Control and Monitor Temperature, Light, Motion, and Humidity with the 4 in 1 Sensor.
To include your switch, start the inclusion process on your HUB and Sensor Button on the back of the device one (1) time.

Value.label: Low Battery Power Level Alarm
Value.Help: Value at which the sensor reports low battery to the gateway Range:10-50 Default: 10

Value.label: PIR Sensitivity
Value.Help: Change the sensitivity of the PIR (Motion) Sensor 0 = off, 1 = Low sensitivity, 10 = High sensitivity Default: 8

Value.label: PIR Trigger Time (seconds)
Value.Help: The amount of seconds between motion detection (ie: the interval) Range:5-15300 Default: 30

Value.label: Basic Set Command Send after PIR Trigger
Value.Help: Should Basic Set Command be sent after PIR is triggered? This is used to turn other devices on/off when motion is detected. Default: No

Value.label: PIR Trigger Correspondence Action
Value.Help: Ability to reverse the Basic Set behavior for devices associated in group 2 Default: ON when motion is tripped, OFF when motion stops

Item.label: ON when motion is tripped, OFF when motion stops
OFF when motion is tripped, ON when motion stops

Value.label: Temperature Sensor Read Interval
Value.Help: The interval in which the temperature sensor is checked, in seconds. Set to 0 to disable (Note: will be rounded to the nearest minute) Default: 7200 (2 hours)

Value.label: Humidity Sensor Read Interval
Value.Help: The interval in which the humidity sensor is checked, in seconds. Set to 0 to disable (Note: will be rounded to the nearest minute) Default: 7200 (2 hours)

Value.label: Luminance Sensor Read Interval
Value.Help: The interval in which the luminance sensor is checked, in seconds. Set to 0 to disable (Note: will be rounded to the nearest minute) Default: 7200 (2 hours)

Value.label: Battery Level Read Interval
Value.Help: The interval in which the battery level is checked, in seconds. Set to 0 to disable (Note: will be rounded to the nearest minute) Default: 86400 (24 hours)

Value.label: Sensor Report Method
Value.Help: Sensor reports are only checked at the interval defined in parameters 101-104. Should the sensor data always be reported, or only if the value has changed more than the threshold configured in parameters 111-114? Always: Send sensor data every interval, even if the value did not change. Threshold: Send sensor data on interval, but only if the value has changed by more than the defined threshold since the last report was sent. Default: Always

Value.label: Temperature Threshold
Value.Help: Set the temperature threshold of the sensor. If Sensor Report Method = "Threshold", the temperature change must exceed this value in order to be reported to the hub. Range: 1-500 1 = 0.1 degrees Celcius, 500 = 50 degrees Celcuis Default: 10 (1 degree Celcuis)

Value.label: Humidity Threshold
Value.Help: Set the humidity threshold of the sensor. If Sensor Report Method = "Threshold", the humidity change must exceed this value in order to be reported to the hub. Range: 1-32, 1 = 1%, 32 = 32% Default: 5%

Value.label: Luminance Threshold
Value.Help: Set the luminance threshold of the sensor (in lux). If Sensor Report Method = "Threshold", the luminance change must exceed this value in order to be reported to the hub. Range: 1-65528 Default: 150

Value.label: Battery Threshold
Value.Help: Set the battery threshold of the sensor (percent). If Sensor Report Method = "Threshold", the battery level change must exceed this value in order to be reported to the hub. Range: 1-100 Default: 10
